rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample natural light and a small reception area, aligned per Vastu to greet guests appropriately.
Spacious living area with seating, entertainment system, and large windows for ventilation and sunlight. The room layout aligns with Vastu directions favoring family gatherings.
Adjacent to the living room, providing a harmonious flow between dining and social spaces. Windows are designed to enhance natural lighting.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout, including ample counter space and ventilation system; located in an auspicious direction as per Vastu principles.
Dedicated living space for the household staff, providing privacy and basic amenities. The placement respects Vastu by avoiding direct alignment with main entrances.
